text: Michael Weiner may refer to: *Michael Weiner (professor) (born 1949), professor of East Asian History *Michael Weiner (actor) (born 1975), American actor and composer *Michael Savage (Michael Weiner, born 1942), American talk- radio host and commentator *Michael Weiner (executive) (1961–2013), Executive Director of Major League Baseball Players Association *Michael Weiner (referee) (born 1969), German football referee
title: Michael Weiner
